title: The Girl Who Wanted Everything
description: Nicole at the age of 10 years old was exposed to more things than she could imagine. Living in a single parent home, with a mother suffering from depression made Nicole grow up with unanswered questions in her young life. Nicole wanted nothing more than to have a mother daughter relationship with her mother Kim. Kim being unavailable emotional prolong the unhappiness and suffering of missing out on what was going on in Nicole youth years. Problem in school, being bullied and teased, seeing her mother sadness and her trying to create memories of happiness only made Nicole youth years turn into adult years. As she goes through this journey of life, she learns that Love can't be create or brought, it's an emotion that one must feel. Nicole taking her negative experience and creating happy memories by creating a list of what she thought would bring her LOVE.
author: Quintasha Wallace
